bike.description: 6061 aluminum main tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, heavy-duty stays, dropper post routing, ISCG 05 chainguide tabs & replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: RST DIRT, external preload adjustor, Coil/MCU spring, 32mm steel stanchions, 130mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
WTB SX23 double-wall disc-specific rims, Formula alloy 6-bolt disc hubs, 14g black stainless steel spokes
SRAM X4 rear mid-cage, Shimano M190 front
TruVativ Blaze 2.0 AM, 36/24T heat-treated chromoly rings, with alloy bash guard, 170mm
Flats, full alloy with pedal spikes
Tektro Novela mechanical disc brakes with 160mm rotors & ML-330 levers
FUNN Flat Out riser bar, 31.8 x 30mm rise x 710mm
FUNN Crossfire alloy 4-bolt bar clamp, 3D forged w/ center CNC bore, 6JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 50mm
FUNN Crossfire alloy micro-adjust, forged one-piece, 31.6 x 400mm
FUNN Solace, water-resistant cover, impact-resistant base
